predicate.note: Frames file for 'demote' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: no agent
example.text: The Volokhs were afraid that they'd end up like a friend of theirs who [*T*-1]'d applied for a visa and waited for 10 years, [*-2] having been demoted [*-3] from his profession of theoretical mathematician to shipping clerk.
